CustomField.description: This field can be used for display call image with perform some action methods on out going call
CustomField.formula: if(Contact_Mobile__c != null,HYPERLINK("javascript:var html_doc = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0]; var js =document.createElement('script');js.setAttribute('type','text/javascript');js.onload = prmy();function prmy(){js.setAttribute('src','/support/console/37.0/integration.js');html_doc.appendChild(js);setTimeout(function(){window.location='Owf:InvokeLync?id=1,"+ Contact_Mobile__c+",Y';sforce.console.openPrimaryTab(null, '/apex/MttlOutgoingCallStd?outgoingId="+Contact_Mobile__c+"', true, 'Outgoing Call', null, 'salesforceTab');},1000);}",IMAGE("/resource/Call", "B"),'_self'),'')
CustomField.label: Call
